Text: Well, what can I say... It installed perfectly on my 4Gb Corsair Voyager but, after reboot from installation upon seing the windows logo, I was greeted by the BSOD. Tx digital pimp for your efforts, this is actually the furthest I've gotten with xp on usb the others I've used before didn't even get past installs. I'll be looking for more from yah... Best of luck to everyone else, you guys should post your results.
